			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;275.74</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">3 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Itinerant Trader</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Gilbert Sigue is a single father with three young children ages 14, 12 and 7. All of his children are attending school. The loan that he is requesting is to use the money as a working capital.</p>

<p>He and his clidren live in the village of Vito which is in the town of Balamban in Cebu province. Gilbert used to be a motorcycle driver but when it became defective, he decided to have a job. He then started to sell various kinds of bread products. He usually travels within the town in order to sell his products to people. He works almost every day and the busiest days are during weekends and public holidays. Through his hard work he managed to support his children attend school. He has been in this job for five years and he now has another unit of motorcycle where he attaches his rolling shelf full of breads. Gilbert has borrowed a small loan from his microfinance organisation, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative, to use as working capital, especially in buying bread from a well-known supplier in the town. He looks forward to save more and produce more rolling bread stores in the future. He intends to repay the loan over three months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 06 May 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

		</footer>

	<div class="row">
		<div class="medium-12 columns heading_breadcrumbs">

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Clarise Masumba</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Lundazi, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427952737_500px_31943_kSHUsN.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427952737_500px_31943_kSHUsN.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Clarise has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£529.08</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;529.08</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Clarise is a Green-grocer.&nbsp; She can help her husband towards the household costs. She is requesting a loan to get more stocks for her shop. The profit from the shop will be used for their farming.</p>

<p>Clarise Masumba is 49 years old and married to a farmer. They have 5 children together. They live in Lundazi district Eastern part of Zambia. Clarise sells deferent types of vegetables like cabbage, tomatoes, onions and kapenta (small fish). She has been in this business for more than 3 years now. She started this business to buy clothes, food, pay school fees for her children and to buy farming equipment. She gets her stocks from Chipata in bulk and sells them on retail in her village. She has been helped run this business by her husband. She is requesting for this loan to order more stocks of vegetables and kapenta. From the profits she hopes to buy an ox-cart and cattle to use at their farm.&nbsp; As woman she is happy because she has furnished her house and helped her husband by buying iron sheets for the family house through access to loans.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 13 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Edina has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£529.08</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;529.08</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Raising poultry</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Edina has a poultry farm. She is requesting a loan to buy more chickens and their feeds. She is hopeful that her profit will grow and she will be able to use the profit to educate her children.</p>

<p>Edina Chipeta is 30 years old. She has five children who are all in school. She runs a poultry farm from this farm she gets an income to use towards her household activities.. She started this business 5 years ago and she has no intentions of changing her business because she enjoys doing it. She is requesting this loan to order chicks, feed and drinkers. Edina started business to be able to provide daily needs for her family since her husband is not working. Most of her customers come from her community and surrounding communities.&nbsp; From her profits she hopes to pay school fees for her children and buy a plot for her family.&nbsp; As a woman she is able to pay rent and buy household needs on her own.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 13 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Edina's loan  with your friends:</li>

		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;625.63</h3>
					</div>

						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>

						<h3 class="grey">Raising poultry</h3>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Janipher runs a poultry business rearing chicks and selling chickens in the local market. She started her business to be able to provide daily needs and reduce financial problems for her family.<br />
&nbsp; <br />
Janipher Zimba is 51 years old. She lives in Lundazi district of Eastern Zambia. She has seven children, all her children are in school. She is requesting for this loan to order to buy more chicken and buy chicken feeds and medication for the chicks.&nbsp; Janipher works from home and has had her business for 3 years. She has employed one worker who helps with the running of her stall. She sells her chicken from home and the market. She started this because she understands it well as her father was a poultry farmer. She sometimes supplies her chicken to lodges and food cafes in her area. Janipher has undergone business management skills and come to appreciate setting savings if she is to benefit in her business. From the profits of her sells she hopes to pay school fees for her children, buy home furniture and to make home improvements. As a woman she is happy that she is able to budget and contribute financially to the well-being of her family.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 15 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;178.93</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">3 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Transport</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Malawi</h3>

				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Filiresi is a widow with seven children they live in Ntcheu District. She want a loan so that she could use the money to transport her potatoes to the market and for her business.</p>

<p>Filiresi grows and sells Irish potatoes. This business helps her to find funds for supporting her family and paying school for her children. She will use the loan for transportation, as she wants to transport her products to the market. She will also use it to pay rent for her selling place in the market. She hopes of becoming independent and plans to reduce her familyâs levels of poverty.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 29 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Tiunikirane is a group consisting of 3 women with different age groups and different marital status as some are married, divorced and widowed. The women sell different products such as tomatoes, beans and metals. They do these businesses in order to financially support their families and to provide them with essential needs. Intending to improve their familyâs living standards, they will use the loan to buy more products, thus also increasing their profits and this will help them to reduce their levels of poverty.<br />
Selina is 40 years old married with seven children. She makes and sells different types of welding materials. She is requesting another loan in order to buy more welding materials. She hopes to send her children to better schools and plans of further expanding her business.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>

						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>

	<div class="row">
		<div class="medium-12 columns heading_breadcrumbs">

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Mulaula Mwale</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Lundazi, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427900332_500px_31879_QwcLHe.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427900332_500px_31879_QwcLHe.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Mulaula has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£529.08</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;529.08</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">General Store</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mulaulaâs business helps her support her big family with their basic daily needs and her childrenâs education. She wants her business to grow but has no saving to invest. She applied for a loan to use it for her business.</p>

<p>44 years old Mulaula Mwale is married with five children who all go to school. She also takes care of 1 orphan who is also in school. She lives in the Lundazi district with her family where she runs a business selling metal dishes, braziers, serving pots and pots. She started her business to be financially independent and to take her children and the orphan she looks after to school. She is requesting for this loan to order more pots, braziers and metal dishes as she wishes to see her business grow bigger and open a bigger shop where she will also be stocking plastic kitchen ware.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 13 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;414.21</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market (Clothing)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Dainess Chakwila requested a loan in order to purchase more bales of second hand clothing and shoes from neighbouring Malawi to sell. Dainess is 52 years old and lives in Lundazi, Eastern Zambia. She has ten children, three of whom are in school. She also looks after five orphans who also attend school. Dainess runs a market stall selling salaula (second hand clothes). She sales these clothes to the local community and surrounding areas. She works from the market and has been doing this business for 8 years. From the profits, she hopes to build her own grocery stall in the future. She also hopes to employ someone who will help her in the day-to-day activities of her business. Dainess started her business to support her husband and provide daily needs for their family. Before she started her business, she did not have any money of her own but now she is happy to have her own reliable source of income and makes decisions on her own.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Dainess' loan  with your friends:</li>
					<div class="addthis_sharing_toolbox" style="display:inline-block;">

	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;529.08</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Shop</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Vailet Lukhele is a widow with seven children to look after. She wants a loan to add more commodities to the shelves in her shop. She hopes that by adding more goods her profit will increase.</p>

<p>55 years old Vailet Lukhele is a mother to five children. Three of her children are in school. She also takes care of 4 orphans who are also in school. 4 years ago after the death of her husband Vailet started a grocery stall where she sells sugar, cooking oil, salt and flour. She started this business to be able to provide the daily necessity needs for her children and orphans and also to take them to school. Her business is growing steadily especially with the loans that she has accessed so far. She is requesting for this loan to order more stocks of sugar, body lotions, soft drinks and flour for her stall. From the profits she hopes to buy a piece of land where she will build a family house.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 13 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Desideria Abatayo is 42 years old and married. She lives in the village of Biason which is in the town of Balamban in Cebu province. She started a small scale business to support her husband towards the household expenses.</p>

<p>She has five children and they are all studying. She is proud that her eldest child is a graduating student of Marine Engineering. Her husband Romil is 46 years old and a public transport driver for about twenty years. To help her husband with their daily finances, Desideria has rented a small space in the public market of Balamban to sell fresh chicken eggs. She regularly acquires a few trays of eggs every day from a local distributor. She then resells then in wholesale or retail basis. The prices of the eggs vary depending on their sizes. She is able to sell 5 to 10 trays of eggs every day. She is also paying 1,500 Philippine pesos for annual permit. For three years in doing this business, she has been able to receive financial assistance from the microfinance organisation, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative. Her latest loan is used as revolving capital in buying and selling eggs.&nbsp; Desideria hopes to become a bigger distributor of eggs in their town someday and save funds for her children&#8217;s educational needs. The loan is repayable over three months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 11 May 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">

		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;1352.54</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Malawi</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>The Tafika group has 15 female members all working hard to improve their living conditions.<br />
Jenipher is a member of this group and needs a loan to re-stock her market stall. </p>

<p>Most of the women in this group have children and they also look after orphans. These women run a number of businesses such as selling vegetables, second hand clothes, fritters and a number of them own grocery stores. The majority of the women started these businesses in order to be able to pay school fees for their children and fulfill their basic needs. They requested this loan to buy more stock for their different stalls. Jenipher Mwale is 36 years old and has six children who go to school. She runs a grocery stall. She needs this loan to buy sugar, soap, cooking oil and salt from the wholesale shops in town to attract more customers from her home village to her stall. She plans on buying a sewing machine in the future so she can one day open a tailoring shop. She believes that the training she received on âSavings Cultureâ by the Micro loan Foundation will help her to achieve what she wants in her business.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 13 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Esnart is 30 years old and married with three children. The children depend on her for their daily survival. She sells maize to people in her community. She wants to obtain another loan in order to buy more bags of maize, as this will help to increase her supply. Her main goal is to become independent and she dreams of having adequate food in her household. With the profits she made from the previous loans, she now bought her own  house.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 04 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

						</tr>
										</tbody>
				</table>
				<br><br>
							</div>
		</div>

	<!-- Grab Google CDN's jQuery, with a protocol relative URL; fall back to local if offline/not found -->
	<script src="/js/app.min.js?v=1437995136"></script>

	<script>
		$(document).foundation();
		var $container = $('#card_container');

		$container.imagesLoaded(function() {
			$container.masonry({
				// main isotope options
				itemSelector: '.card',
				isAnimated: false
			});
		});
	</script>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;414.21</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Shop</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">

						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>

				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Jessy Matanje is 43 years old and has four children who go to school. She runs a grocery stall in Eastern Zambia selling salt, soap, cooking oil and drinks. She is requesting this loan to order more cooking oil, soap, and drinks from Chipata.&nbsp; She works from the market and has had her business for almost ten years. She started her business to reduce poverty levels for her family and be able to send her children to school. From the profits of her larger sales, she hopes to build a house for her family and another grocery stall when she finds enough funds. Before she started her business, she was depending on her husband but now she is happy that she is self-reliant.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 04 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Indra Miti</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Lundazi, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1428158450_500px_32048_BlSb54.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">

		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">

						<p>Indra has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£842.07</strong></p>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;842.07</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market (Clothing)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Indra Miti is 36 and divorced with three children who are all in school.&nbsp; She lives with her family in Lundazi district in the Eastern province of Zambia. For the past two years Indra has run a second hand clothes shop.&nbsp; She started her business with the hope of being financially independent and to provide for her family. She orders her products within Lundazi and the provincial capital Chipata where there are larger markets. She requested a new loan to finance a trip to Chipata to order five bales of second hand clothes. Typically these come from Europe and North America. These products when ordered will attract more customers to her business which will allow her to make more profits. She is helped in the running of her business by her relatives. From the profits she hopes to continue to fund her children&#8217;s education and hopefully build a new shop from where she can work.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Grace Ngulube</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Lundazi, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427902943_500px_31883_RiuEsG.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427902943_500px_31883_RiuEsG.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Grace has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£625.63</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;625.63</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Shop</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Grace started her business two years ago. Her main focus is to help her own 5 children and the 5 orphans through school and give her family a decent life.</p>

<p>Grace Ngulube runs a grocery shop just outside her house. She is 42 years old, married and has 10 children in total 5 is her own and 5 orphans.&nbsp; Her children go to school but the 5 orphans are not in school. She lives with her husband and children in the Eastern part of Zambia Lundazi district in particular. Two years ago, Grace started her business with the hope of building a family house which she completed last year. Before she started her business, Grace was farming and looking after her family. She is requesting for this loan to acquire more stocks of sugar, cooking oil, salt, candles, detergent pastes, refreshments and biscuits.&nbsp; She runs her business with her husband who is also a businessman baking buns and sweet scones.&nbsp; She hires temporal workers who bring her stocks to her shop from the market after ordering. Her ambition is to make sure her family earn a better living.&nbsp; Grace is full of praise for the loans she has been accessing as they have allowed her to change the living conditions of her family.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 15 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;421.03</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Enia Kapani runs a market stall selling fritters and assorted drinks.&nbsp; She started her business to be able to send her children to school and to provide meals for her children. She is requesting this loan to order more stocks of assorted drinks, flour, yeast and sugar. From the profits of her larger sales she hopes to build a family house and be able to sponsor her childrenâs school to college. Enia is 30 and married with five children. All her children are in school in Mazabuka district where they lives. She is thankful for the access to the loans because her life has changed tremendously.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427959277_500px_31949_iQhj7B.jpg')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427959277_500px_31949_iQhj7B.jpg" alt="">
					</div>
										<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427959287_500px_31950_iHmxHq.jpg" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
						<div class="profile-header_slide_thumbs slider-nav hide-for-small">
								<div>
					<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427959277_500px_31949_iQhj7B.jpg" alt="">
				</div>
								<div>
					<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427959287_500px_31950_iHmxHq.jpg" alt="">
				</div>
							</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Tiyamike has fully repaid their loan of <strong>Â£1102.28</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;1102.28</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Malawi</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>The Tiyamike group consists of 20 women aged between 20 &amp; 50 years. Most of the women have children &amp; others also take care of orphans. These women run a number of businesses such as selling onions, tomatoes and usipa (small fish). They started these businesses in order for them to be able to pay school fees for their children and provide them with basic needs. These women have different marital status as some are married and others are divorced. The group has accessed previous loans from our partner The Microloan Foundation and have successfully repaid them.<br />
Flora Mkandawire is part of the group, she is 40 years old and has five children who she looks after. She sells tomatoes, onions and usipa (fish).&nbsp; She started this business in order to financially support her family. She is requesting another loan to buy tomatoes and fish. She plans of expanding her business and to eventually have good selling place in the market. She has found training on âBusiness Managementâ very useful and she believes these will help her achieve what she wants for her market stall. As a woman she is proud to be independent and she has managed to buy fertilizer for her family field.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Tiyamike's loan  with your friends:</li>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;3080.76</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>This loan is for a group named Mtendere women group, which has 17 members, who range in age from 28 to 58 years old. The group is based in Petauke district Eastern province of Zambia. The marital status of these women are different some single, married, divorced and widowed. Most of these women have children and look after orphans who go to school. Women of Mtendere group have different small-scale business which include selling; potatoes, pots and groceries.&nbsp; They started their businesses for different reasons, but mostly to reduce poverty levels within their families and to be independent.<br />
The group is applying for its third loan. They have undergone business management training skills to help them manage their business well. The purpose for this loan is to order more potatoes, pots and groceries for their businesses. The loan will mean they will meet the needs of their clients thereby making more profits. They use profits to buy household goods, clothes and pay for their children school fees. <br />
Victoria Phiri who is 35 years old; a divorced parent with 5 children is a member of Mtendere group. She runs a grocery shop selling rice, sugar, eggs, cooking oil, detergent pastes, and body lotions. She has been doing this business by the roadside for 2 years now. Before she started her business Victoria was farming and looking after her family. She started this business because itâs easy to manage. She orders her products in bulks from town. She is requesting for this loan to order more products for her business to sell in her village. She runs her business alone but hopes to employ someone when her business grows. Victoria will use part of her profits to send her children to school. She is also saving to buy a plot were to build a family house. As a woman Victoria is grateful and happy for the loans she has accessed as it has helped her look after her children and has been able to support herself.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>

						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;631.17</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Faith Nyirongo lives in the Eastern part of Zambia in Lundazi district. She is 45 years of age and married to a farmer.&nbsp; They have 6 children who are all in school. Faith is an ambitious woman, 4 years ago she started selling beans outside her house with the hope of helping her husband provide for the family. Today her business has grown; she is now running a general stall in the town centre main market selling different types of lotions, detergent pastes, soft drinks, second hand clothes. She orders her products from the big town of Chipata where there are big markets so she can get a better price. She is requesting this loan to finance another visit to Chipata where she intends to order ladies shoes, soft drinks and body lotions to sell in Lundazi. She will also use part of the money for transport. This loan will enable her to make more profits to help her pay school fees for her children. As a woman, she happy to be financially equipped through accessing these loans from our partner Microfinance Institution, The Microloan Foundation.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;389.58</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Margret Mwanza lives in the Eastern part of Zambia particularly Nyimba district. She is 26 years of age looking after 3 children who are all in school. An ambitious woman she is, three years ago she started the business of selling clothes outside her house with the hope of improving the living conditions of her family through having good nutrition, providing a better accommodation for her family and education for her children. Today her business has grown; she owns a market stall in a nearby market where she does her business from. She sells kapenta (small fish), buns and tomatoes. She orders her goods in Nyimba town in bulk in return sell them on retail in her village. She is requesting for this loan to order other products not in stock like beans, fruits and rice as a way of expanding her business. She hopes to make more profits on this business as these products are on demand. Margret involves her relatives in running her business when she goes out for orders. As a woman, Margret is happy that she is financially independent.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

			<h1>Lucia Dumdum</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Poblacion, Asturias, Cebu, Philippines</p>
