<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;340.27</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">3 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">General Store</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Luciaâs husband passed away ten years ago. She is very active and runs a stall selling basic stuff. She has applied for a loan from the microfinance organisation, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative, to purchase more stocks of commodities for her store.</p>

<p>Lucia Dumdum is 73 years old and lives in the town of Asturias in Cebu province with her two children and two grandchildren. Aside from her monthly pension, Lucia earns income by running a small store near their home. She sells basic commodities like tinned goods, condiments, breads, sweets, sodas, powdered drinks, tissues, shampoos and soaps. All her products are properly arranged inside the store. She has shelved attached to the walls and the store is painted white which makes it more appealing. Despite her age, she can still serve the customers, arrange her products and manager her funds. With the loan she will buy detergent soaps and powders, coffee, cooking oil, tinned goods, and biscuits. Lucia usually buys all her goods from the wholesalers located in the town&#8217;s market. She hopes to expand her business to save more for her future financial needs. She intends to repay the loan over three months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 29 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

	<div class="row">
		<div class="medium-12 columns heading_breadcrumbs">

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Florina Nyirenda</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Lundazi, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427899890_500px_31877_9pkHRU.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427899890_500px_31877_9pkHRU.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Florina has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£518.14</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;518.14</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market (Clothing)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>52 years old Florina Nyirenda lives in Eastern Zambia with her four children and two orphans who go to school. She runs a market stall selling salaula (second hand clothes). She is requesting this loan to order a bale of bed sheets and blankets for her stall. She started her business to be able to reduce poverty levels for her family and provide food for them. She works from the market and has had her business for over 10 years now. Currently, her family helps with the day today running of her business. Most of her customers are people in her community and neighboring communities. She hopes to build a big house to be put on rent and be able to provide all daily necessities for her family from the profits of her larger sales. As a woman she is proud that she is able to support her family.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 04 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;848.78</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Greengrocer</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">ASKI</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mrs Rosel Plata is a 24-year old woman. Her partner is engaged in buying and selling of palay or rice. To assist in earning for their daily needs, Rosel has decided to open a vegetable and condiment store business wherein she also offers vegetables, eggs and fish products, vinegar, seasonings and a lot more. The front of her stall is filled with different kinds of vegetable that are properly arranged using rectangular trays. Her most salable products include cabbages, tomatoes, chayotes, onions, garlic and eggs. Inside her store are shelves filled with condiments and other cooking ingredients. Her biggest earning per month is 10,000 Philippine pesos. A big part of her earnings is rolled as additional capital for the business. As an undergraduate, it is Roselâs greatest dream for her two children to finish college education. She believes that with proper education her children will have a better future. She wants to avail another loan from her micro-finance organisation, Alalay sa Kaunlaran to purchase more stocks of vegetables, fish, eggs and other daily commodities. This will enable her to make the business more profitable. The loan amount she believes that the financial assistance given by her MFI will surely help in making her dreams into reality. She is willing to repay the said loan over six months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 16 February 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Brenda Baricuatro is 27 years old and married with 4 children aged 9, 7, 5 and 1. Her family lives in the village of Bagawines which is in the province of Negros Oriental. Her husband is a driver of a public transport motorcycle. Brenda has been selling grocery items in a small sari-sari store in front of their home. She has started this business last year. She goes to the wholesale market to buy items in bulk.&nbsp; To increase the quantity of stocks, she has requested her first loan from her microfinance institution Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative.<br />
She wanted to use the money to buy more stocks for her store to increase her sales and profit. Brenda intends to repay the loan over six months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 29 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;3048.04</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">General Store</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>The Kondwani group comprises 10 women aged between 19 and 55. These women are based in the Petauke district of Eastern Zambia. They have children who are in school and they also look after school going orphans. The women of this group run small scale businesses with the main aim of supplementing their husbands provide for daily needs for their families.</p>

<p>Mirriam Phiri is a member of this group. She is 22 years old, married to an electrician and together they have four children (two sets of twins). Mirriam runs a grocery stall selling washing paste, eggs and sweets. She started her business to be financially independent.&nbsp; She started her business last year and she has applied for this loan to order stocks for her stall. She will order cooking oil, washing soap, candles, soya pieces and bathing soap. She believes once these items are stocked in her stall, she will attract more customers hence she will make reasonable profits which she will use to buy household needs. She also hopes to build a bigger grocery stall.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 14 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

	<!-- KISSmetrics tracking snippet

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;3587.81</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">General Store</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>The Tayamika group comprises of 13 women aged between 29 and 60. These women have childrenwho are in school and they also look after orphans who are equally in school. They run small scale businesses with the hope of supplementing their husbands who are either farmers or seasonal casual workers in cotton companies. This group has successfully repaid two loans from the microloan foundation and they are now requesting for the third one.<br />
Alaidah Tembo 58 years old is a member of this group. She is divorced and has seven children who are in school. She runs a grocery stall with the main aim of being able to support her children after they divorced with her husband. She runs her business in the market and has had her business for over seven years. She is requesting for this loan to top up on her business capital and order more stocks of sugar, cooking oil, soya pieces, washing and bathing soap. She hopes to be able to send her children to school from the profits of her larger sales. She hopes that her business will grow big in the near future.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 26 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Christine Zulu</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Nyimba District, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1428399771_500px_32116_E64qVE.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1428399771_500px_32116_E64qVE.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Christine has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£268.80</strong></p>
					</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;268.8</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Christine requested a loan to use it as a running capital for her business. She is planning to use a part of the money to increase some of the basic stocks.&nbsp; She can help her husband towards the household costs.</p>

<p>Christine Zulu has been running a market stall for 2 years now. She is 23 years old. She sells beans, eggs and fritters. She sources for her stock with Nyimba district. She started her business to help her husband pay for their 5 children school fees and to support herself. However, she needs more income to achieve her goals so she applying for this loan to increase her capital which will in turn generates more profit. The loan will be spent on ordering more trays of eggs, tomatoes and baking ingredients. She is hoping to change her business when has enough capital, she wants to be rearing chickens. Her hopes for the family are to provide them with the basic necessities throughout the year to educate her children. Christine has been trained in business skills and has come to appreciate the lessons, for her market research helped to set up her business. She is looking forward to expand her business through the loan. As a woman she is happy to be empowered financially.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 13 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

		<div class="heading">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="medium-12 columns heading_breadcrumbs">
			<ul>
				<li><a href="/">Home</a></li>

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Mercy Banda</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Nyimba, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427812504_500px_31864_H1Ae3l.jpg')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427812504_500px_31864_H1Ae3l.jpg" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Mercy has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£318.54</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;318.54</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Raising poultry</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mercy Banda 38 years old married with 3 children and she is requesting a loan to buy feed for her chick rearing business.&nbsp; She lives with her family in Nyimba district of Eastern Zambia. She only has two children in school. Mercy runs a poultry business rearing chicks and selling chickens. She started her business to help her husband provide the daily needs for their family and reduce financial problems.&nbsp; She is requesting  this loan to order more chicks, buy feed and medication for the chicks.&nbsp; Mercy works from home and has had her business for 3 years. She is helped to run the poultry by her relatives. From the profits of her sells she hopes to be able to pay school fees for her children and make home improvements. She also hopes to build a house for her children.<br />
As a woman she is happy that she is able to budget and contribute financially to the well-being of her family.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;283.52</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market (Clothing)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Malawi</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Matrida is requesting a loan to develop her new second-hand clothes business. She will use the loan to purchase bales of skirt and blouses. </p>

<p>Matrida used to be a farmer and obtaining a loan will help her to grow her new business. She now sells second hand clothes to people in her community. She depends on this business for her daily provision and for providing her children&#8217;s basic needs and welfare. She plans on hiring someone to help her run her business and hopes to build a better house. The loans she previously received have helped her to become independent and she is now able to pay school fees for some of her children.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 13 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Matrida's loan  with your friends:</li>
					<div class="addthis_sharing_toolbox" style="display:inline-block;">
						<div id="atstbx" class="at-share-tbx-element addthis_32x32_style addthis-smartlayers addthis-animated at4-show">
							<li class="share-page_inner_link">
								<a class="at-share-btn at-svc-email button-share mail"><span class="icon mail after green"></span></a>

							<li class="share-page_inner_link">

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;265.83</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Ngawa Lungu is 35 years of age. She is married to a farmer and they have 6 children together. All their children are in school. She lives in Nyimba district of Eastern province in Zambia. Ngawa sells different types of vegetables in a nearby market. She started her business to be able to pay school fees for her children and provide the daily needs for her family. She is requesting this loan to order more vegetables and fruits for her stall. She has had her business for a year now. From the profits she hopes to build a shop where she will be selling groceries as a way of expanding her business. She hopes she can save enough money to send her children to university.<br />
She is happy that this business allows her to pay school fees for her children and buy household goods without difficulties.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

		<div class="heading">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="medium-12 columns heading_breadcrumbs">
			<ul>

		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Elena Belano</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Anopog, Pinamungajan, Cebu, Philippines</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1423557422_500px_30128_FgAVy5.JPG')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">

					</div>
												</div>
						<div class="profile-header_slide_thumbs slider-nav hide-for-small">

					<img src="/img/loans/cache/1423557422_500px_30128_FgAVy5.JPG" alt="">

		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Elena has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£85.07</strong></p>
					</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;85.07</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Raising livestock</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mrs Elena Belano is 30 years old and married. She has one child. Her husband, Renante, works as a security guard in a private company in the city. With the help of her husband she raises pigs at their home in Anopog which is in the town of Pinamungayan in Cebu. She has applied for a loan from her micro-finance organisation Lamac, Multi-Purpose Cooperative, because she wanted to acquire better volumes of feeds and vitamins for her pigs. The pigs are looked after and get them prepared for three months before the meat are  sold to local butchers in the market and neighbors as well. She hopes that the said loan could help her buy more pigs and make her business more progressive. The income she will receive from the business is to be saved and used to buy additional piglets. She intends to repay the loan over a period of 6 months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 16 February 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;277.66</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Malawi</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Miriam is 30 years old and she sells dry fish to people in her community, she started this business in order to support her family. Miriam has five children and only two of her children go to school. Her children also help her in running her business. She will use the loan to expand her business by purchasing more stock of fish. She plans to build a better house for her children. The profits from the loans she has received from our partner Microfinance Institution, The Microloan Foundation have helped her to be able to pay school fees for her children and to provide them with clothing.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Mirriam's loan  with your friends:</li>
					<div class="addthis_sharing_toolbox" style="display:inline-block;">
						<div id="atstbx" class="at-share-tbx-element addthis_32x32_style addthis-smartlayers addthis-animated at4-show">
							<li class="share-page_inner_link">
								<a class="at-share-btn at-svc-email button-share mail"><span class="icon mail after green"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li class="share-page_inner_link">
								<a class="at-share-btn at-svc-facebook button-share facebook"><span class="icon facebook after brand"></span></a>
							</li>
							<li class="share-page_inner_link">
								<a class="at-share-btn at-svc-twitter button-share twitter"><span class="icon twitter after brand"></span></a>

		</div>

						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;212.36</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>

						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Baker</h3>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Christine Tembo sells fritters by the roadside opposite a school. She is 63 years old, married with 6 children. None of her children are in school. She has been in this business for 1 year now. She started her business with the hope of help her husband provide for their family. She is requesting for this loan to order flour, cooking oil, sugar and other baking ingredients. Mainly her customers are school going children and passer byes. She started this business because it is easy to manage and has more profits. Before she started the business Christine was farming and looking after her family. As a woman she is happy to be empowered financially through access to loans.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

				<h1 class="text-center">Lenders supporting Christine</h1><br>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;512.33</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Clothes Shop</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mrs Ma. Lelebeth Sullano is 27 years old. She is married and has a 4 year old daughter. Her husband Wendyl is 32 years old. Lelebeth and Wendyl were both employed as production workers in a manufacturing company in Mactan which is a city in Cebu province. She stopped working when she got pregnant with her daughter. In order to help her husband financially, she started to sell beauty products by being a licensed agent of a known direct selling company.&nbsp; Apart from being a licensed beauty agent, the couple is engaged in small-scale shirt printing services which they started in 2010. Her husband is skilled in making designs for various events like feasts, parties and reunions. He uses silk screen printing which is a technique that uses woven mesh to support an ink blocking stencil to receive the desired image. They needed a capital to buy materials needed in their business like shirts, silk screen and inks. That is why Lelebeth applied for a loan as a member of a micro-finance institution, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative. She plans to repay the loan over six months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 26 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Mzamose Tembo</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Nyimba, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427376959_500px_31682_iBK24Y.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427376959_500px_31682_iBK24Y.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Mzamose has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£372.01</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;372.01</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mzamose Tembo is a resident of Mtilizi Resettlement Scheme in Nyimba district of Eastern Zambia. She is 57 years old and married, her husband is a farmer. They have five children together of which two are in school. They are also looking after two orphans who are in school. Mzamose sells beans from a nearby market. She has been in the business for the past two years. She started her business with the hope of sending her children to school and to provide for the family. She requested a loan in order to purchase beans in bulk. She also intends to start selling salaula (second hand clothes). She will use part of the money for transport to order bales of salaula in neigbouring Malawi.&nbsp; Mzamose believes she will make more profits after selling her stock. She banks part of her profits and the other profits are uses to buy food, pay school fees and make home improvements. Mzamose chose selling clothes because it is everyoneâs need in the society. Before she started her business Mzamose was farming and looking after her husband and family.&nbsp; From the time that she started getting loans from MicroLoan Foundation, she has seen significant changes at home and business. She has bought household goods, food, clothing, pays school fees on time and her business has grown.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;263.24</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Chazingwa Sakala is 49 and lives in eastern Zambia with her husband. They have 6 children together. Chazingwa runs a market stall selling groceries and this loan will be used to buy more stock for her stall. Among her products are books, sugar, cooking oil, rice, assorted soft drinks and biscuits. She started her business to enable her pay school fees for children and two workers at her farm who help them in farming activities. She is requesting this loan to order sugar, soft drinks, cooking oil, books, pens and rice. She has had her business for three years now. From the profits she hopes to build a shop where she will be selling groceries. She hopes she can save enough money to send her children to university.<br />
As woman she is happy that she is able to pay school fees for her children and buy household goods without many difficulties.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Chazingwa's loan  with your friends:</li>

						<h3 class="grey">&pound;86.8</h3>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Cristina Enclonar is 23 years old and married woman with one daughter aged 3. Her husband Ernesto is 36 years old and sells gasoline in retail. For 3 years, Cristina has been selling fresh vegetables. She displays her products at the store of her mother-in-law. Many of her neighbours prefer to buy her vegetables instead of going to the town&#8217;s public market and spend more on transportation. She recently requested a loan amounting to 5,000 Philippine pesos from her microfinance institution Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative. She will use the fund to buy more fresh vegetables from wholesalers. She plans to repay the loan over six months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 03 February 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Eunice Phiri</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Nyimba, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;212.36</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Eunice Phiri is aged 31, a divorced mother with 4 children who are all in school. Eunice runs a market stall selling bananas, oranges and apples with the hope of raising money to feed her family.&nbsp;  She lives in Nyimba district of Eastern province in Zambia. . She has been in this business for 6 months now. She is applying for this loan to expand her business. She will order oranges and apples. This loan will expand her customer base in turn making more profits. This is her first loan which has given her high hopes of expanding her business. Before she started her business she was involved in farming activities and looking after her family. Her hopes for the family are to see all her children being educated. She is hoping that through her business she can build a family house to ease the burden of paying rentals.<br />
As a woman, Eunice is grateful to be financially empowered through these loans from our partner, The Microloan Foundation.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 01 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

					<img src="/img/loans/cache/1420770934_500px_28817_SByr1e.JPG" alt="">
				</div>
							</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Maria clara has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£1684.93</strong></p>
					</div>

		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;1684.93</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Food Production</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mrs Maria Clara Cano-og is 45 years old and lives in the village of Luray II which is in Toledo in Cebu province. She is married and has four children. Three of them had attended proper schooling and now have their own families. Her youngest child is still studying in a nearby school. Her husband named Guillermo started their business simply by buying piglets to grow as pigs in a spacious area near their home. Once the pigs are fully-grown, they then sell it in a per kilo basis in the market. Even though it profited, it was still not enough to cover all their expenses.&nbsp; It was in year 1990 when Guillermo tried to make a lechon.&nbsp; Lechon is pork dish being served in several regions of the world. It originated in Spain but was adopted by the Philippine culture. Lechon involves roasting a suckling pig. The first lechon tasted not too good but Guillermo did not stop in making the dish perfect. He tried until he reached the desired taste that people would love. That was the beginning of their Lechon business. In order to help her husband expand the growing business, Maria Clara sought a loan to the microfinance institution, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative, where she has been a member for nine years. To date she has completed seven past loans successfully. She recently requested a bigger amount of loan to the MFI in order to buy bulk of pigs to grow and make as lechon. They sold out fifty-seven lechon last holiday season which proves that their products are of high quality. Each lechos is being sold between $112 and $223 depending on the total weight. On regular days, two to four lechon are being sold. They currently employ eight people; six of them are close relatives. Every Sunday they also sell lechon in retail by selling them in per kilo basis in the public market of Toledo. They plan to buy a more spacious plot in a nearby area in order for them to raise pigs on their own. This will also be an opportunity to raise more sales in the future as well as employing more people within the community to help in the business.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 12 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
