						<h3 class="grey">&pound;637.08</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Construction</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Elizabeth Mbewe is 47 years old, she is married with four children. Three of her children go to school. She runs a business selling stones used for building. She buys stones from people who live along the mountains in her area and crush them. She has two temporal workers who help her to carry and crash these stones. She started this business to be able to support her family and to be self dependant. Elizabeth is requesting for this loan to top up on her capital and buy more stones. She also hopes to buy a wheel barrow which her workers will be using to ferry the stones. She has plans to diversify to opening a grocery stall where she will be selling different types of groceries.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Elizabeth's loan  with your friends:</li>
					<div class="addthis_sharing_toolbox" style="display:inline-block;">

						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Lossie Banda runs a bakery shop just outside her house. She is 36 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. She is also looking after 2 orphans who are in school. She lives with her husband and children in the Eastern part of Zambia, Lundazi district in particular. Two years ago, Lossie started her business with the hope of building a family house which she hopes to complete this year. Before she started her business, Lossie was farming and looking after her mother. She requested a loan to acquire more stocks of sugar, flour, salt and other baking ingredients. She will also use part of the money to expand her bakery.&nbsp; She hires one temporary worker who brings her stocks to her shop from the market after ordering. Through the profits, she hopes to boost her sales by opening up a market stall were she will sell green groceries and fruits. <br />
Lossie is full of praise for the loans she has been accessing as they have allowed her to change the living conditions of her family.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 07 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;318.54</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Ruth Lungu is 40, a single mother with one child who is married. She is looking after one orphan who is in school. She lives in Nyimba district of Eastern province in Zambia. <br />
Ruth runs a business . She orders her stocks within the district from local wholesalers. She ventured into the grocery business because they are daily needs in the society. She has been in this business for five years now. She does the business with the help of her child. She is requesting for this loan to expand her business. She will order sugar, soya pieces, biscuits, candles and many other products. Ruth hopes to see her retail shop turn into a wholesale shop. The loans she has accessed before has helped her pay school fees for children and buy farming inputs. She is hoping that through her business she will build a family house to ease the burden of pay rentals.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

				<h1 class="text-center">Ruth's loan  Repayment schedule</h1>

							<td>June 2015</td>
							<td>&pound;72.40</td>
							<td>&pound;66.35</td>
						</tr>
																	<tr class="profile-table_data-row" >
							<td>July 2015</td>
							<td>&pound;72.40</td>
							<td>&pound;67.28</td>
						</tr>

							<td>&pound;72.38</td>

				</table>
				<br><br>
							</div>
		</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;344.86</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">3 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">General Store</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Pablo runs a small general store in front of his house. He sells household items in his store. He wants to buy stocks and have running capital for his business. So Pablo requested a loan from his micro-finance institute.</p>

<p>Pablo Limpio is 57 years old and has two children. The eldest is married and living separately while the youngest is still attending high school. His wife, Basilides, is 56 and currently works as a teacher. His family lives in Aliwanay which is in the town of Balamban in Cebu province. Pablo runs a small sari-sari (convenience) store in front of his house. He sells canned goods, hygienic products, sodas, biscuits, candies and other grocery items. He is also offer mobile phone credits in retail. All his products are inside the store and can be seen through a large window covered with screen. He has been running the store for the past three year. He has recently sought a loan from the micro-finance organisation, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative, in order to have additional working capital. He needs the fund to restock his store so he could increase his daily sales and income. He intends to repay the loan over three months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 06 May 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

<div class="content dark">

		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;744.79</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market (Clothing)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Scolastica is 27 years old, married with one child who is in school. She is requesting a loan to buy bales of second hand clothes which she will sell at the market. Her husband is a subsistence farmer. An ambitious woman she is, 3 years ago with a little capital she started selling second hand clothes to sustain her family and to pay school fees for her children. Today her business has seen significant growth since she started accessing loans from our partner, The Microloan Foundation. She is requesting this loan to further her expand her business by ordering more bales of clothes. She will order 2 bales of childrenâs clothes, 1 bale of ladies clothes and the the remaider will be used for transport. Scolastica involves her husband in running her business when she goes out for orders. From the profits of her business and money generated by her husband from farming Scolastica and her husband hope they can build a family house. She also hopes to start selling groceries as a way of diversifying her business. As a woman she is happy that she is financially independent and able to contribute to the budget of her family.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 01 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;614.79</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">General Store</h3>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mrs Roselda Rata is 35 year old, married with 5 children. One of her children is taking college education, one is in high school and three are in their elementary level. Roselda is engaged in both general store and restaurant businesses. Her husband works as a carpenter/fisherman. Roseldaâs passion in her business makes her progressive each day. She is now managing the business for five years where she could earning 10,000 Philippine pesos a month. This includes the sale of the fish that her husband catches. With five children attending school, the couple is doing their very best to finance their educational needs thus they do want to further improve their sources of living. Roselda is applying for a loan to her micro-finance organisation, Alalay sa Kaunlaran. This will enable her to purchase more products for her store such as biscuits, canned goods, detergent soaps, shampoos and vegetables. She also wants to buy a durable fish net for the fishing activities of her husband. Roselda will be very grateful to have the opportunity to earn more for their children through this additional capitalization. She is willing to repay her loan over six months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 28 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>

	================================================== -->
	<script type="text/javascript">var _kmq = _kmq || [];
	var _kmk = _kmk || 'd552eaf77347990723d21dfc9f7ad2cc01b34488';
	function _kms(u){
	  setTimeout(function(){
	    var d = document, f = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
	    s = d.createElement('script');
	    s.type = 'text/javascript'; s.async = true; s.src = u;
	    f.parentNode.insertBefore(s, f);
	  }, 1);
	}
	_kms('//i.kissmetrics.com/i.js');
	_kms('//doug1izaerwt3.cloudfront.net/' + _kmk + '.1.js');
	</script>

			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;544.13</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">3 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Shop</h3>

					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">

						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>

				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Jocelyn Cuyos is 35 years old and has three children ages 10, 6 and 4. All of her children are attending school. Jocelyn runs a progressive shop in her town that offers a wide variety of consumable goods and merchandise.</p>

<p>Her family lives in the neighbourhood of Owak which is in the town of Asturias in Cebu province. Her husband is Arnold who is 33 years old and works as a village counsellor. Her store is located near the main road and her house is just walking distance away from her store. Her customers are mostly passers-by and people within her locality. Jocelyn primarily sells animal feeds, rice and corn. Sacks are displayed inside her store with labels depending on the variety. She sells these in wholesale and retail. She also has other common products such as sugar, cooking oils, eggs, canned goods, detergents, toiletries, sodas, biscuits, chocolates and candies. On the other side of her store, she also sells vegetables, local vinegar, spices and steamed rice wrapped in native leaves. She has applied for a loan from the microfinance organisation, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative, to buy items in bigger quantities for her shop. She will receive discounts from the wholesalers by paying the acquired products in lump sum. Jocelyn believes her investment in the business will help increase her income and enable her to support the needs of her family. She wants to be a large supplier of animal feeds, corn and rice in her town someday. Her loan is repayable over a period of three months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 29 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>

			<form class="login-popup_inner" action="/my_account/login" method="post" data-abide>
				<h3>Sign in</h3>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;340.27</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">3 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Greengrocer</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Elma has a vegetable shop.&nbsp; She values her business so much because it provides regular daily income that helps her family to cover up their expenses. She wants a loan to invest in her shop.</p>

<p>Elma Casajuras is 39 years old and single. She lives in the village of Poblacion in Asturias town which is in the province of Cebu. Elma runs a small vegetable stall at the public market of the town. She has been selling fresh vegetables for the past four years. Her stall is filled with a lot of different kinds of vegetables that she acquires from a local wholesaler. She then sells the products either in per kilo basis or per piece. Some of her common items include potatoes, cabbages, carrots, chayotes, onions, onion strings, cucumbers and garlics. Elma has been an active member of the microfinance organisation, Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative, for two years and repaid six past loans. The latest loan she requested will be used to buy more supplies of vegetables, as well as food seasonings for her stall. She is willing to repay the loan over three months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 29 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

	<!-- Grab Google CDN's jQuery, with a protocol relative URL; fall back to local if offline/not found -->
	<script src="/js/app.min.js?v=1437995136"></script>

	<script>
		$(document).foundation();
		var $container = $('#card_container');

		$container.imagesLoaded(function() {
			$container.masonry({
				// main isotope options
				itemSelector: '.card',
				isAnimated: false
			});
		});
	</script>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;137.5</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Fishmonger</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mrs Marjorie Pahayahay is 35 years old. She has three children aged 11,9 and 3. All of her children are attending in the nearest public school in their village at Vallehermoso which is in the province of Negros Oriental. Her husband Ronnie is a fishmonger who travels in the remote area to sell fish. She stays in a small area outside the public market to sell her fresh fish and other seafood products. She puts up a tent to protect her and her goods from the intense sun and rain. She then packs up and cleans the area whenever she&#8217;s done for the day. She needs more capital to acquire larger volumes of fish. Wholesalers usually prioritise market vendors who pay in cash. She became a member of Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative three months ago and applied for her first loan . She plans to repay the loan over six months. Marjorie and her husband work hand in hand in order for them to save money for their children&#8217;s further education.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 29 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

				</ul>
			</div>
		</footer>

		<div class="heading">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="medium-12 columns heading_breadcrumbs">

		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Linda Chirwa</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Petauke, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1424356249_500px_30439_cXeQeI.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1424356249_500px_30439_cXeQeI.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Linda has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£912.85</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;912.85</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Mrs Linda Chirwa is 37 years old.&nbsp; She runs a market stall in Kalambule village Eastern part of Zambia in Petauke district. She sells eggs and fritters. She started her business to send her three children to school as she is a widow. She has been in this business for three years now.&nbsp; Linda is requesting for this loan to expand her business by ordering more trays of eggs, a bag of flour and other baking ingredients. She will use part of the money to pay rentals for her stall and she also intendeds to order chickens which are at the point of lay so that she can be supplying eggs within her community. Ordering these products will enable her to meet the demands of her customers and spend more time on her business. This will also enable her to make more profits so that she can support her family and build her own grocery stall.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 31 March 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">

					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Linda's loan  with your friends:</li>

		<div class="heading">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="medium-12 columns heading_breadcrumbs">
			<ul>
				<li><a href="/">Home</a></li>
				<li><a href="/search">Lend</a></li>
			</ul>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Agness Banda</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Nyimba, Zambia, Zambia</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1427377594_500px_31684_UnpIEB.png')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1427377594_500px_31684_UnpIEB.png" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Agness has fully repaid her loan of <strong>Â£190.97</strong></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;190.97</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">4 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Zambia</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Agness Banda is 51 and would like a loan to buy more stock for her small grocery shop. Agnes lives in Nyimba district of Eastern province in Zambia. She has 3 children who are all married and 3 grandchildren who she looks after.&nbsp; Agness sells sugar, rice, cooking oil, salt, biscuits and soft drinks among others. She orders her stocks within the district from local wholesalers. She ventured into a grocery business because they are daily needs in the society. She is requesting for this loan to expand her business. She will order cooking oil, sugar, rice and biscuits which will allow her to meet the demands of her customers.<br />
The loans she has accessed before has helped her pay school fees for her grandchildren and buy farming inputs. She is hoping that through her business build she will be able to build a family house. <br />
 As woman she is happy to be able to pay school fees for her grandchildren and buy household goods with fewer difficulties than before.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 01 April 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Zambia";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

			<div class="profile-share_inner">

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;86.8</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Food Shop</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Nympha Bayot is a 51 year old married woman with 10 children. Four of her children are still in primary school. She resides in the village of Labon in the province of Negros Oriental together with her seven dependents and her husband Alexander, a 52 year old carpenter. For the past 3 years, Nympha has been runnning a small sari-sari (convenience) store where she sells food and snacks like bread, biscuits and shakoy. Shakoy is a native delicacy and an all-time favorite afternoon snack in the province. Shakoy is a twisted fried donut coated with caramelized sugar. She often makes shakoy because its very salable to students and factory workers.<br />
She intends to display her products from vendors in the school premises and engage on a consignment basis. In order to have more working capital, she has requested a loan from the microfinance institution Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative. Her loan is worth 5,000 Philippine pesos which she will use to buy more ingredients to create more of her products. She will repay the said amount over six months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 03 February 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="large-12 columns profile-share">
			<div class="profile-share_inner">
				<ul>
					<li class="profile-share_inner_title">Share Nympha's loan  with your friends:</li>
					<div class="addthis_sharing_toolbox" style="display:inline-block;">

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;172.43</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">6 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">General Store</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">LAMAC</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>Remedios Enclonar is a 58 year old married and has 1 adult child. She lives together with her husband Felipe in a village called Bagawines in Vallehermoso town. When she was younger, she used to work as a housemaid. After geeting married, she then decided to stop from her work and run a small sari-sari (convenience) store business. Her store is made of wood and wire screens to cover the front. Buyers can easily see her products from inside. This has been her source of income for the past 36 years. She requested a loan from the microfinance institution Lamac Multi-Purpose Cooperative in order to have more stocks of products to be displayed at her store. She wants to earn higher so she needed to increase the volume of her products so her customers will have many goods to choose from. This is her first loan to the MFI and she intends to repay it over six months.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 29 January 2015</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Philippines";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

		<div class="small-12 columns heading_title">
			<h1>Tithokoze</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="small-12 columns heading_sub-title">
			<p class="left"><span class="icon location darkgreen before"></span>Ntcheu, Malawi</p>
			<p class="right hide-for-small"><a class="white" href="/search">View all entrepreneurs</a></p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="profile-hero">
	<div class="blurred-image" style="background-image: url('/img/loans/cache/1419428408_500px_27722_Yim5Rs.jpg')"></div>
	<div class="row profile-header collapse">
		<div class="medium-7 columns profile-header_slide">
			<div class="profile-header_slide_image slider">
														<div>
						<img src="/img/loans/cache/1419428408_500px_27722_Yim5Rs.jpg" alt="">
					</div>
												</div>
					</div>
		<div class="medium-4 columns">
			<div class="row profile-header_side">
				<div class="slarge-push-0 large-12 columns profile-header_side_meta with-pie">
					<div class="pieContainer text-center">
						<img src="/img/pies/pie-completed.svg" data-interchange="[/img/pies/pie-completed.svg, (default)], [/img/pies/pie-completed-small.svg, (small)]">
					</div>
				</div>
				<div>
					<div class="large-12 large-pull-0 columns profile-header_side_outstanding">
						<p>Tithokoze has fully repaid their loan of <strong>Â£244.04</strong></p>
					</div>

<div class="content dark">
	<div class="row">
		<div class="large-12 columns content-section with-popover with-share">
			<div class="content-section_inner">
				<div class="row icon-display">
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/amount-requested-green.svg" alt="Amount Requested">
						<p>Amount requested:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">&pound;244.04</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/repayment-term-green.svg" alt="Repayment term">
						<p>Repayment term:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">8 Months</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/activity-type-green.svg" alt="Activity type">
						<p>Activity type:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Market Stall (Food)</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="small-6 medium-3 columns icon-display_item">
						<img src="/img/icons/green/mfi-partner-green.svg" alt="MFI Partner">
						<p>MFI partner:</p>
						<h3 class="grey">Microloan Foundation Malawi</h3>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="row">
					<div class="medium-7 columns content-section_content_copy">
						<p>This is a group loan for the Tithokoze group who are based in the Ntcheu district of Malawi. The group is comprised of 10 women and most of these women have children, aged between 1 and 20 years old. The women of Tithokoze group run small-scale businesses such as market stalls selling maize, beans tomatoes and Irish potatoes. They started their businesses in order to reduce poverty within their families, and to be able to pay school fees for their children.&nbsp; They will use the loan to expand their businesses by buying more stock.</p>

<p>Esnart Matemba is 44 years old and has five children, three of whom go to school while the other two are married. She is a member of Tithokoze group and she sells maize and beans. Esnart runs her business from home and has been doing so for four years. She wants this loan in order to increase her business by buying more stock. She hopes to expand her business and start the construction of a good house when she has saved enough money from the profits of her business.&nbsp; She has found the training on Loan Management offered by Microloan Foundation very useful and she believes these lessons will help her to achieve what she wants for her business and family. She is an independent woman and is proud to now be able to support her children by paying for their tuition fees at private schools.
</p>						<p class="content-section_content_copy_added"><span class="icon before time">loan added: 25 December 2014</span></p>
					</div>
					<div class="medium-4 columns content-section_content_map">
						<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyDlRTUcITSIxHz0JAJAkzFE2XJXI53HySI"></script>
						    <script type="text/javascript">
						    	var geocoder;
								var map;
								function initialize() {

									geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();

								  var address = "Malawi";
								  geocoder.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
								    if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
								      map.setCenter(results[0].geometry.location);
								      var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
								          map: map,
								          position: results[0].geometry.location
								      });
								    } else {
								      alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
								    }
								  });

								  
								  var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(-34.397, 150.644);
								  var mapOptions = {
								    zoom: 5,
								    center: latlng
								  }
								  map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map-canvas'), mapOptions);
								}

								google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);

						    </script>
						    <div id="map-canvas" style="height: 300px;"></div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
